attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app does not work. It is so bad it gives you incorrect information, and it always crashes. Please delete this app it’s a waste of time.

attributes.title: I’m upset
attributes.review: Got the app because all my friends had it but all of us kept crashing overall it is a very bad app and it is not worth the time

attributes.title: Ignorance
attributes.review: Whoever developed this app needs to go back to school because it is soooo buggy and bland for one and secondly it just spreads ignorance and hatred which I know is on brand for the Trump campaign but it needs to be taken down ASAP

attributes.title: bad 🧚‍♀️💫💖
attributes.review: i downloaded this app thinking it would be a fun app about our president i love america 🇱🇷💫💖but when i got this app it came to my house ate my dog and peed in my bedroom. 😿😿😿then it ate my eyes it also took my house and my car  the trump app is very mean and it went to my school and bullied everyone 😾😾😾i can’t believe this app would do this don’t download very bad💫🧚‍♀️💖trump app is very mean and it still is a meanie head

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: This app might be the worst on the App Store. I don’t understand how this information and propaganda continues to be spread. Donald trump is narcissistic egotistical slime with a superiority complex and the emotional capacity of a toddler that throws temper tantrums when he doesn’t get what he wants.

attributes.title: I was so confused
attributes.review:
All I saw was naked women my mom saw this and took my phone away now I’m using my iPad because this is payback☹️ I was so excited to be supporting one of the members of the Simpson family but now I am disappointed. 

Love,
CB

attributes.title: hello 👁👄👁
attributes.review: HELLO. melanoma trump has been in my dreams since downloading this app. not only that, trump has found a way to enter my house and physically delete tik tok from my phone. anyways, very upset, very poor quality, do not recomend. goodbye.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app took forever to download! Only for it to not work! Kept crashing and telling me to go back to mexico.  How does the App Store support such white supremacist actions coming from this app?

attributes.title: 🤮🤢🤢 this app is disgusting
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what going on with ✨our orange 🍊✨ but it’s not good. Don’t download. Don’t recommend. 0/10 for me. ✨🧚hopeful this app gets deleted cause no one should use it✨🧚. 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢😤😤😤🤬😡🎃 I AM MAD AT THIS APP. THIS APP NEEDS TO BE DELETED. I HATE IT. ITS MAKES ME SICK. APPSTORE NEEDS TO DELETE THIS..!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: This app would not open it is so terrible 😡 it took almost two weeks to download and did not even work if I could rate 0 stars I would
